SEARCH
Package Branch

Class Branch

java.lang.Object
Branch.Branch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Branch extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a branch of the fast food ordering and management system. This class encapsulates all the necessary attributes and methods to manage a branch, including its staff, managers, menu, and orders.
See Also:

    • Branch

      public Branch(String branchName, String branchLocation, int staffQuota)
      Constructs a branch with a specific name, location, and staff quota.
      Parameters:
      branchName - The name of the branch.
      branchLocation - The location of the branch.
      staffQuota - The maximum number of staff allowed in this branch.

      Gets a list of branch manager IDs.

    • addBranchManager

      public boolean addBranchManager(String staffID)
      Adds a new branch manager to the branch if the maximum number of managers has not been reached and the manager is not already present.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the branch manager to be added to branch.
      Returns:
      True if the manager was added successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeBranchManager

      public boolean removeBranchManager(String staffID)
      Removes a branch manager to the branch manager is not present in Branch. Prompts user to add back a manager to hit manager quota.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The ID of the branch manager to be removed from branch.
      Returns:
      True if the manager was removed successfully, false otherwise.

    • setMaxNumManagers

      public void setMaxNumManagers()
      Sets the maximum number of managers for the branch based on the current number of staff.

    • getnumManagers

      Returns:
      The maximum number of managers allowed in the branch.

    • getStaffIDs

      Returns:
      True if the staff member was added successfully, false otherwise.

      Parameters:
